short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Otis will help you save and load the positions, sizes, tabs and url:s of your browser windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Save windows with their tab url:s, screen positions and sizes.
- Save and load multiple presets.
- Close all other windows or leave them open.
- Import/Export presets.
- Set keyboard shortcuts.

GitHub: https://github.com/ahedenholm/OtisWindowsaver
Trello: https://trello.com/b/86LsJoI5/otis-windowsaver
